name: Admin
description: Full administrative access to the platform.

name: University Admin
description: Administrative access within their university context.

name: Principal Investigator
description: Lead researcher and manager of a lab.

name: Lab Manager
description: Manages day-to-day operations of a lab.

name: Senior Researcher
description: Experienced researcher, may supervise others.

name: Postdoctoral Researcher
description: Researcher with a completed doctorate.

name: Graduate Student
description: Student pursuing a Master's or PhD.

name: Undergraduate Student
description: Student pursuing a Bachelor's degree.

name: Research Assistant
description: Provides support for research activities.

name: Technical Staff
description: Provides technical support and instrument maintenance.

name: Visiting Scholar
description: Researcher visiting from another institution.

name: Guest User
description: Limited access for external visitors.

name: Intern
description: Temporary research intern.

name: Safety Officer
description: Responsible for lab safety protocols.

name: Procurement Officer
description: Manages lab purchasing and inventory.

name: IT Support
description: Provides IT assistance for the lab.

name: Alumni
description: Former lab member with limited access.

name: Collaborator
description: External collaborator with specific project access.

name: Project Lead
description: Leads a specific research project within a lab.

name: Data Analyst
description: Focuses on data processing and analysis.

name: Web Developer
description: Maintains the lab's online presence or tools.

name: Administrative Assistant
description: Provides administrative support.
